results.title: Medecin Malgre Lui
results.brief_description:
Argan, a hypochondriac who coughs constantly to impress upon his family and physicians the gravity of his condition. So concerned is Argan for his health that he resolves his daughter must marry a medical student, thereby ensuring he has a doctor near him at all times.

Credits: Director, Francois Gir ; photography, Robert Juillard ; music, Dominique Paladilhe.
Cast: Jean-Pierre Darras, Rosy Varte, Claude Nicot, G. Audoubert, Herve Sand, Dora Doll, Giani Esposito.

results.title: Mechanised batter stabilzation
results.brief_description: When roads, waterways and railways are made through a cutting, erosion occurs on the banks or batters. The subsoil having been largely removed, grass or other plants will not easily grow. Mechanised equipment is now used to stabilise these batters. First the eroded gullies are eliminated, then a mixture of bitumen and straw mulch applied and finally water, seed and fertilizer sprayed on. The bitumen stabilises the soil, the straw mulch protects the seedlings and pasture regeneration is no longer a problem.

results.title: Mechanical handling of traffic
results.creator_credit: British Railways and Southern Region Film Unit
results.brief_description: Mechanical aids to handling increasing amounts of goods and parcels leading to faster freight services on British Railways. Shows in some detail the various mechanical aids which speed up handling safety and efficiency in sheds, yards and stations.

results.title: Mechanical energy
results.brief_description: Describes how mechanical energy exerts a force in solid, liquid and gas states and how we use these forces to do work. Explains potential and kinetic energy and how machines provide mechanical advantage.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Paul McKenna’s easy way to health & fitness”.
Hypnotist Paul McKenna presents a program designed to improve self-confidence by making hypnotic and subliminal suggestions aimed at the unconscious.

results.title: Mckenna's mind matters: control stress (S)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Paul McKenna’s easy way to health & fitness”.
WARNING: THIS VIDEO SHOULD BE KEPT OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN AND PERSONS UNDER 18 YEARS OF AGE. THIS VIDEO SHOULD NOT BE WATCHED BY ANY PERSON WHO SUFFERS, OR MAY SUFFER FROM EPILEPSY, CLINICAL DEPRESSION, OR ANY OTHER NERVOUS OR PSYCHIATRIC CONDITION The Epilepsy Foundation of Victoria advises that this program contains outdated information, terminology and practices. The video “Control stress” will calm you down and preserve energy in order to reach goals. Using the latest techniques of personal enhancement, and hypnotic powers of trance to build up inner strength and peace.

results.title: Matthew Flinders
results.brief_description:
A depiction of Matthew Flinders and his wife arriving at a shack and meeting Aboriginals. After what seems to be an attack by an Aboriginal on a white person, Flinders kills the Aboriginal and he and his wife set sail.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: Matthew Flinders
results.brief_description:
This film recounts the story of Flinders and Bass’ journey to Australia and describes their discoveries of Australian coastlines and Tasmania, all of which was to be recorded in a book written back in England by Flinders himself.

An animated short entered to “Create a Stamp Story” section of ACMI’s ‘Screen It’ media making competition for Primary Schools.

results.title: Matt Mann's swimming techniques for girls
results.brief_description: A demonstration of Matt Mann’s teaching principles applied to a group of girls. The crawl, breast stroke, back stroke, and butterfly stroke are demonstrated in both regular and slow motion photography.
